LanguageData.GR_Transcended.label: participated in archotech awakening
LanguageData.GR_Transcended.rulePack.rulesStrings.0: tale_noun->[PAWN_nameDef] participating in the archotech awakening
LanguageData.GR_Transcended.rulePack.rulesStrings.1: image->[PAWN_nameFull] toggling on the archotech AI [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.GR_Transcended.rulePack.rulesStrings.2: image->[PAWN_nameFull] trembling in fear of the archotech AI [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.GR_Transcended.rulePack.rulesStrings.3: image->[PAWN_nameFull] looking with unease at the archotech AI [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.GR_Transcended.rulePack.rulesStrings.4: image->[PAWN_nameFull] checking the integrity of the archotech project [circumstance_group]
LanguageData.GR_Transcended.rulePack.rulesStrings.10: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is concentrating intently on the controls.
LanguageData.GR_Transcended.rulePack.rulesStrings.11: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] has [PAWN_possessive] eyes slanted and looks confident.
LanguageData.GR_Transcended.rulePack.rulesStrings.12: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is fidgeting, [PAWN_possessive] eyes open wide.
LanguageData.GR_Transcended.rulePack.rulesStrings.13: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] is smiling with grim joy.
LanguageData.GR_Transcended.rulePack.rulesStrings.14: desc_sentence->[PAWN_pronoun] seems to be fully in control of the situation (but reaaaally isn't).
LanguageData.GR_Transcended.rulePack.rulesStrings.15: desc_sentence->There is a trace of ozone in the air.
LanguageData.GR_Transcended.rulePack.rulesStrings.16: desc_sentence->A nearby [Animal] is looking up, startled.
LanguageData.GR_Transcended.rulePack.rulesStrings.17: desc_sentence->A [Animal] is fleeing the lab in fear.
LanguageData.GR_Transcended.rulePack.rulesStrings.18: desc_sentence->There is a [TerrainFeature] in the background.
LanguageData.GR_Transcended.rulePack.rulesStrings.19: desc_sentence->A [PersonJob] watches silently from afar, fearing for his future.
